numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Most people who say that the world is getting better are 15-to-24-year-olds.
2. Most people who say that the world is getting better live in countries with better conditions.
3. I wonder if people who are older than 40 in these countries also agree that the world is getting better in each generation.
4. I wonder if the percentage of votes of people who are older than 40 is not very high.
6. Most people in my community believe that the world is getting better each time.
7. The headline is: Is the world getting better?
